author: intrepid42
body:
* Produces
  * GenJetCollections (jets, fat jets, dressed leptons)
  * GenParticleCollections (neutrinos, photons, GenJet constituents, jet tag particles [taus, charm/bottom hadrons])
  * METCollection
* Collections are created from native Rivet code -> CMS analyses which use these collections are easily implemented in Rivet

Credits to @jhgoh for the initial PseudoTopProducer :)
title: ParticleLevelProducer based on Rivet
